moves.1. d4:
youll see this opening in my other annotated game
It is NOT pretty, I lose some minors due to carelessness
moves.7. Ne4: I admit this was a mistake, I drop a free minor. never do this move.
moves.9... Nxe5 10. dxe6 fxe6: always take with the outer pawn
moves.11. c5: I sac'd the poor pawn to unclog the diagnol of nowhere
moves.13. Qxc5 Bf8: !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!???????????????????? this person't turn to be careless, i guess. two free pawns in a row.
moves.14. Qxa7 Nd3+ 15. Bxd3 Bxd3 16. Qd4: this is a lovely fork, where i redeem myself. note that I'm exactly a rook's worth of points down at this point
moves.17... Bf5: he made 2 mistakes: one is the b bishop and the other is...
moves.18... Ke7 19. Bxb4+: i honestly did not see the rook, if this plan wasn't thought out as well as it was, this would have worried me
moves.21. Qxg8+ Ke7: i wanted to trade queens, kind of. the bishop scared me a little in a battle of otherwise rooks.
moves.23. Qc3 Qb8 24. Qh8+ Ke7: this is where i was most tempted to trade. oh well, should've when you could've (skillet)
moves.26. Qg7: should've moved there in the first place. make a mental note if you find yourself in this EXACT spot
moves.26... Rxb2: saw this coming, didn't think it was a threat. moving on. (now that i see the bishop, i see the potential danger)
moves.27. Rd1+ Kc6 28. Qxd7+ Kc5: can you find the way to take the rook for free?
moves.29. Qd4+ Kc6 30. Qd7+: this was unnecessary please ignore this for the rook puzzle.
moves.30... Kc5 31. Qd4+ Kc6 32. Rc1+: you can almost hear the burn.
moves.32... Kb7 33. Qxb2+ Kc8: if I was going to trade, I would have done it now. but i didn't, instead i got a free queen in 3 moves: watch (can you see it?)
moves.34. Qh8+ Kd7: he moved there to prevent the deadly king-queen rook pin, it was a good move.
moves.35. Rd1+: another non required move, but just to drive my point home
moves.35... Ke7 36. Qxb8: Resignation. White wins this game, an unavoidable attack on c7 would force the king into hiding behind is precious e pawn. I would castle and hit him with the triangle attack of queen rook rook
